thread.title: CBSA Haining Open: World Number 3 from China crushes compatriot Tang 4-0
thread.title_full: CBSA Haining Open: World Number 3 from China crushes compatriot Tang 4-0

title: CBSA Haining Open: World Number 3 from China crushes compatriot Tang 4-0
text:
CBSA Haining Open: World Number 3 from China crushes compatriot Tang 4-0 
CCTV.com Share this: Share on twitter Share on facebook Share on sinaweibo Share on email Font size: 
At CBSA Haining Open, the PRC's premier potter Ding Junhui was taking on Tang Jun, with the winner of this match moving on to the Round of 32.Ding looks to be in brilliant form as he grabs the first two frames with ease. He produces a break of 123 in the second against his wildcard opponent.In the third frame, Tang fails to pot a black right around the pocket. That mistake is all Ding needs, and the home favorite manages to clear the table to lead 3-0.The fourth frame sees Ding take firm control after sinking a long-range red. With very little drama, the World Number Three makes a break of 69, and wins the match 4-0 after only one hour at the table, to reach the Last 32."We played quite fast. Four frames in one hour is close to my record when I'm training. He was a very good player when I was young, but now I think he couldn't concentrate on crucial balls. He should have played better," Ding said. Related Videos
